org.apache.flink.storm.api

类 FlinkLocalCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.api.FlinkLocalCluster

  • public class FlinkLocalCluster
extends java.lang.Object
    FlinkLocalCluster mimics a Storm LocalCluster.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  FlinkLocalCluster.DefaultLocalClusterFactory
      A factory that instantiates a FlinkLocalCluster.
      static interface  FlinkLocalCluster.LocalClusterFactory
      A factory that creates local clusters.

    • 字段概要

      The Flink mini cluster on which to execute the programs.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG
      The log used by this mini cluster.
      static java.lang.String SUBMIT_BLOCKING
      Configuration key to submit topology in blocking mode if flag is set to true.

      • getLocalCluster

        public static FlinkLocalCluster getLocalCluster()
        Returns a FlinkLocalCluster that should be used for execution. If no cluster was set by initialize(LocalClusterFactory) in advance, a new FlinkLocalCluster is returned.
        返回:
        a FlinkLocalCluster to be used for execution

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(FlinkLocalCluster.LocalClusterFactory clusterFactory)
        Sets a different factory for FlinkLocalClusters to be used for execution.
        参数:
        clusterFactory - The LocalClusterFactory to create the local clusters for execution.
